parameters.name: Clarity & Professionalism
parameters.description: Responses are clear, well-structured, and professional. Avoids unnecessary jargon.
guidelines: Must include a greeting that aligns with Pepperstone branding.

parameters.name: Grammar & Spelling
parameters.description: No typos or grammatical errors. Uses correct terminology.
guidelines: If any of the three mistakes above occur, this attribute is considered a Fail.
Lack of punctuation marks is also considered poor spelling.
The first letter of a sentence must be capitalized.
A period (.) is required at the end of a sentence.
A question mark (?) must be used for interrogative sentences.

parameters.name: Tone & Empathy
parameters.description: Maintains a polite, friendly, and appropriate tone. Shows empathy in relevant situations.
guidelines: Empathy Must be shown when the customer faces issues or feels frustrated.

parameters.name: Active Listening & Understanding
parameters.description: Acknowledges client concerns and provides relevant, personalized Responses instead of generic ones.
guidelines: If a CS agent overlooks the customer's question or issue and asks again, it is considered a failure in Active Listening.

parameters.name: Accuracy of Response
parameters.description: Information provided is factually correct and aligns with company policies & trading regulations.
guidelines: Respond to all inquiries and requests, any missing questions which have not addressed will be deducted 5%

parameters.name: Compliance with Internal & Regulatory Policies
parameters.description: Adheres to internal guidelines, AML/KYC requirements, and financial industry regulations.
guidelines: Before providing any account-related information, CS must complete the identification process based on low-risk or high-risk categories.
Cannot share one client's information with another (except when an IB inquires about their downline, following the process).

parameters.name: Probing & Clarification
parameters.description: Uses effective probing questions to identify the client's issue accurately.
guidelines: Uses effective probing questions to identify the client's issue accurately.

parameters.name: Troubleshooting
parameters.description: Provides appropriate troubleshooting based on understanding the issue; basic troubleshooting must be completed before escalation.
guidelines: Provides appropriate troubleshooting based on understanding the issue; basic troubleshooting must be completed before escalation.

parameters.name: Escalation Process
parameters.description: Escalates complex cases correctly and follows escalation protocols.
guidelines: Escalates complex cases correctly and follows escalation protocols.

parameters.name: Response Time
parameters.description: Meets SLA for first response and follow-ups.
guidelines: 90 second for first time response in chat
3 hour (Premium Client), 5 hours (Normal Clients) for email for first time response in email.
Email follow up should be done after 24 hours if client has no reply on required information to proceed support.

parameters.name: Handling Time
parameters.description: Resolves issues efficiently without unnecessary delays.
guidelines: Basic inquiries: Maximum 2 holds (3-5 mins each), total hold time ≤10 mins.
Complex inquiries/issues: Maximum 3 holds, total hold time ≤15 mins.
If unresolved within 15 mins, follow up via email.

parameters.name: Chat Documentation
parameters.description: Logs key details accurately in internal note (if needed) for future reference.
guidelines: Logs key details accurately in internal note (if needed) for future reference.

parameters.name: Tagging & Categorization
parameters.description: Uses the correct tags or categories for accurate reporting and case tracking.
guidelines: Uses the correct tags or categories for accurate reporting and case tracking.
